title: Charles de Gaulle reconsidered
itunes:title: Charles de Gaulle reconsidered
itunes:subtitle: Historian Julian Jackson, author of a major new biography of Charles de Gaulle, offers a fresh take on the iconic French leader, exploring his role in World War Two and decolonisation, among other things.
description:
Historian Julian Jackson, author of a major new biography of Charles de Gaulle, offers a fresh take on the iconic French leader, exploring his role in World War Two and decolonisation, among other things.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
